duration_raw: until the end of your turn
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">[True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Fortune" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=76" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 379 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

**Bloodline**
[Draconic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=5)

**Deities**
[Achaekek](/Deities.aspx?ID=29), [Cernunnos](/Deities.aspx?ID=116), [Dammerich](/Deities.aspx?ID=117), [Eiseth](/Deities.aspx?ID=169), [Erastil](/Deities.aspx?ID=6), [Falayna](/Deities.aspx?ID=119), [Falayna](/Deities.aspx?ID=119), [General Susumu](/Deities.aspx?ID=176), [Gorum](/Deities.aspx?ID=7), [Iomedae](/Deities.aspx?ID=9), [Otolmens](/Deities.aspx?ID=145), [Ragathiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=126), [Ragathiel](/Deities.aspx?ID=126), [Raumya](/Deities.aspx?ID=195), [Sekhmet](/Deities.aspx?ID=58), [Shizuru](/Deities.aspx?ID=47), [Sorrow's Sword](/Deities.aspx?ID=249), [Yaezhing](/Deities.aspx?ID=184)

**Patron Theme**
[Fate](/Patrons.aspx?ID=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the end of your turn
</row>

</column>

---

A glimpse into the future ensures your next blow strikes true. The next time you make an attack roll before the end of your turn, roll the attack twice and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being concealed or hidden.
name: True Strike

summary: Make your next attack especially accurate.
summary_markdown: Make your next attack especially accurate.
text: True Strike Source Core Rulebook pg. 379 4.0 Traditions Arcane, Occult Bloodline Draconic Deities Achaekek, Cernunnos, Dammerich, Eiseth, Erastil, Falayna, Falayna, General Susumu, Gorum, Iomedae, Otolmens, Ragathiel, Ragathiel, Raumya, Sekhmet, Shizuru, Sorrow's Sword, Yaezhing Patron Theme Fate Cast Single Action verbal Duration until the end of your turn --- A glimpse into the future ensures your next blow strikes true. The next time you make an attack roll before the end of your turn, roll the attack twice and use the better result. The attack ignores circumstance penalties to the attack roll and any flat check required due to the target being concealed or hidden.
